Brooklyn, NY. Full time.

Docracy is the GitHub for legal documents. We are disrupting legal services for good by open sourcing contracts and allowing everyone to branch and sign them. You can have a look for yourself here: http://www.docracy.com/

We are a diverse team of 2 senior devs (Docracy's MVP was built in the time of a Hackathon - and won) and a fully recovered lawyer. VC-backed, working of the new NYU incubator in Dumbo.

We are looking for a seriously good front-end dev with a sense of design to create a document editor that will put MS Word to sleep forever, and a Java developer who will learn from the best of the best. More info here: http://www.docracy.com/application/jobs
